{"name": "ProJet-Interfaith Food Pantry", "alternate_name": "", "description": "Please arrive 15 minutes before closing to ensure you get served.
6102581100 ext 13

Northampton County residents only

Distribution is in the side of the parking lot", "email": "", "url": "https://www.projecteaston.org/foodpantry", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "320 Ferry Street", "address_2": null, "city": "Downtown Historic District", "state_province": "PA", "postal_code": "18042", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 40.6894975, "longitude": -75.210096}, "phones": [{"number": "(610) 258-2198", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Monday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "16:15"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "14:00", "closes_at": "16:15"}, {"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "17:00", "closes_at": "07:15"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Proof of address required"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "ID required"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Must bring own bags/cart"}, {"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "Clients can visit: Once a month"}, {"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "Diapers upon availability"}, {"attribute_key": "OFFERING", "attribute_value": "Female hygiene products"}]}
